TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RangeValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator

summary.span: 檢查輸入控制項的值是否在指定的值範圍內。

span.span: Checks whether the value of an input control is within a specified range of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制測試輸入控制項的值是否在指定範圍內。The control tests whether the value of an input control is within a specified range. 控制項會使用四個索引鍵屬性來執行其驗證。The control uses four key properties to perform its validation. 屬性包含要驗證的輸入的控制項。The property contains the input control to validate. 和屬性指定的有效範圍的最小和最大值。The and properties specify the minimum and maximum values of the valid range. 屬性用來指定要比較的值的資料類型。The property is used to specify the data type of the values to compare. 要比較的值會轉換成這個資料型別中，執行驗證作業之前。The values to compare are converted to this data type before the validation operation is performed. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為且目前的月曆類型非西曆，驗證程式執行僅在伺服器端驗證。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 驗證用戶端指令碼僅支援西曆日曆。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 下表列出可以比較不同的資料類型。The following table lists the different data types that can be compared. |資料類型Data Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|字串資料型別。A string data type.| |`Integer`|32 位元帶正負號的整數資料型別。A 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|雙精確度浮點數資料型別。A double-precision floating point number data type.| |`Date`|日期資料型別。A date data type.| |`Currency`|Decimal 資料類型可以包含貨幣符號。A decimal data type that can contain currency symbols.| > [!NOTE] > 如果是空的輸入的控制項，就會成功驗證。Validation succeeds if the input control is empty. 使用表示輸入的控制項設為必要欄位的控制項。Use a control to make the input control a mandatory field. > [!NOTE] > 控制項會擲回例外狀況，如果所指定的值或是無法將屬性轉換為指定。The control throws an exception if the value specified by the or property cannot be converted to the specified . > [!NOTE] > 當您使用內控制控制項，請確定驗證程式控制項和其相關聯的控制項位於相同的面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 如需使用詳細資訊控制項的部分頁面更新，請參閱[網頁局部呈現概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 如需有關驗證控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱。For additional information on validation controls, see . ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立在網頁上，以判斷輸入控制項中輸入的值是否比較的範圍內的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on the Web page to determine whether the value entered into an input control is within the comparison range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[RangeValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RangeValidator/CS/rangevalidatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RangeValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RangeValidator/VB/rangevalidatorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddAttributesToRender(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddAttributesToRender (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: ，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 將需要呈現給控制項的 HTML 屬性和樣式加入至指定的 物件中。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles for the control that need to be rendered to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中的自訂伺服器控制項的方法，讓文字一律會顯示為粗體。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text always displays as bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 判斷輸入控制項中的內容是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the content in the input control is valid.

returns.span: 如果控制項有效，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，讓它一律會驗證該值存在，而且是在最大值和最小值為指定。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always validates that the value exists and is within the maximum and minimum values specified for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MaximumValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MaximumValue : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證範圍的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of the validation range.
The maximum value of the validation range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定驗證範圍的最大值。Use the property to specify the maximum value of the validation range. 如果這個屬性所指定的值無法轉換成所指定的資料型別 屬性中擲回例外狀況。If the value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定`ValidationDataType.Date`for而不需要以程式設計方式設定應用程式的文化特性的屬性，您應該用於文化特性中性的格式，例如 YYYY/MM/DD和屬性。If you specify `ValidationDataType.Date` for the property without programmatically setting the culture for the application, you should use a culture-neutral format, such as YYYY/MM/DD, for the and properties. 否則，日期可能不正確解譯。Otherwise, the date may not be interpreted correctly. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定驗證範圍的最大值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the maximum value of the validation range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[RangeValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RangeValidator/CS/rangevalidatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RangeValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RangeValidator/VB/rangevalidatorvb.aspx#1)]

The minimum value of the validation range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定驗證範圍的最小值。Use the property to specify the minimum value of the validation range. 如果這個屬性所指定的值無法轉換成所指定的資料型別 屬性中擲回例外狀況。If the value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定`ValidationDataType.Date`for而不需要以程式設計方式設定應用程式的文化特性的屬性，您應該用於文化特性中性的格式，例如 YYYY/MM/DD和屬性。If you specify `ValidationDataType.Date` for the property without programmatically setting the culture for the application, you should use a culture-neutral format, such as YYYY/MM/DD, for the and properties. 否則，日期可能不正確解譯。Otherwise, the date may not be interpreted correctly. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定驗證範圍的最小值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the minimum value of the validation range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
